sentence.Network_en: In short, it has followed a sustained , deliberate policy of competitive undervaluation.
sentence.Network_cn: 简言之, 它采取的是一种长期、慎重 、 且有利于增强竞争力的汇率低估政策.

sentence.Network_en: China has maintained this undervaluation with massive intervention in currency markets.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过大量干预外汇市场,中国维持着这种低估局面.

sentence.Network_en: Estimates of the degree of undervaluation vary massively.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于人民币汇率低估程度的各种估算差异极大.
